item.description: This is a great way to meet other players and watch some rugby too. The first game starts at 10:30 --- if you get there for the game there is a $20 cover and it includes breakfast. You can come a little later for the next game (no cover) at 1pm England v Wales or 4pm France v Scotland. Either way, there should be players there all day :) Come on down, meet us and have some fun!
item.how_to_find_us: One of many patrons at the bar watching the game(s)
item.name: Six Nations (Professional Rugby)
